references.reason: This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), a foundational model for the diffusion models used in this research.

references.paper_title: A style-based generator architecture for generative adversarial networks
references.reason: This paper introduces StyleGAN, a highly influential generative adversarial network (GAN) architecture that significantly impacts image generation and is relevant to the conceptual framework of this paper.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces CLIP, a model that connects image and text embeddings, crucial for the personalization and editing capabilities of diffusion models explored in the research.

references.paper_title: DreamBooth: Fine tuning text-to-image diffusion models for subject-driven generation
references.reason: This paper introduces DreamBooth, a method for personalizing diffusion models which directly inspires the approach of generating customized diffusion models for different identities in this research.

references.paper_title: LoRA: Low-rank adaptation of large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces LoRA, a low-rank adaptation technique for fine-tuning large language models,  essential for efficiently personalizing the large diffusion models in this study.
